option.name: originalContent
option.value:
from odoo import models, fields
# Declaración de un modelo # Hereda todas las funcionalidades de models class GradesEvaluation(models.Model): _name = 'grades.evaluation' # nombre del modelo
name = fields.Char(string = 'Course Name') date = fields.Date(string = 'Date') description = fields.Text(string = 'Description') course_id = fields.Many2one('grades.course', string = 'Curso', ondelete='cascade') grade_ids = fields.One2many('grades.grade', 'evaluation_id', string='Grades')

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
from odoo import models, fields
# Declaración de un modelo # Hereda todas las funcionalidades de models class GradesEvaluation(models.Model): _name = 'grades.evaluation' # nombre del modelo
name = fields.Char(string = 'Course Name') date = fields.Date(string = 'Date') description = fields.Text(string = 'Description') course_id = fields.Many2one('grades.course', string = 'Curso', ondelete='cascade') grade_ids = fields.One2many('grades.grade', 'evaluation_id', string='Grades')

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
from odoo import models, fields
class GradesGrade(models.Model): _name = 'grades.grade' _description = 'Grade'
student_id = fields.Many2one('res.partner', string='Student', required=True, domain=[('is_student', '=', True)]) value = fields.Float(string='Value', required=True) date = fields.Date(string='Date', required=True) evaluation_id = fields.Many2one('grades.evaluation', string='Evaluation', required=True, readonly=True)

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
from odoo import models, fields
class GradesGrade(models.Model): _name = 'grades.grade' _description = 'Grade'
student_id = fields.Many2one('res.partner', string='Student', required=True, domain=[('is_student', '=', True)]) value = fields.Float(string='Value', required=True) date = fields.Date(string='Date', required=True, default=fields.Date.context_today) evaluation_id = fields.Many2one('grades.evaluation', string='Evaluation', required=True, readonly=True)

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<odoo> <record id="grades_evaluations_action" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">Evaluations</field> <field name="res_model">grades.evaluation</field> <field name="view_mode">list,form</field> </record>
<record id="grades_evaluations_list_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">grades.evaluation.list</field> <field name="model">grades.evaluation</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <list string="Courses"> <field name="name"/> <field name="date"/> <field name="description"/> <field name="course_id"/> </list> </field>
</record> <record id="grades_evaluations_form_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">grades.evaluation.form</field> <field name="model">grades.evaluation</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="Courses"> <sheet> <group> <field name="name"/> <field name="date"/> <field name="description"/> <field name="course_id"/> </group> <group> <field name="grade_ids" mode="list" editable="bottom"> <list string="Grades"> <field name="student_id"/> <field name="value"/> <field name="date"/> </list> </field> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record> </odoo>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<odoo> <record id="grades_evaluations_action" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">Evaluations</field> <field name="res_model">grades.evaluation</field> <field name="view_mode">list,form</field> </record>
<record id="grades_evaluations_list_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">grades.evaluation.list</field> <field name="model">grades.evaluation</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <list string="Courses"> <field name="name"/> <field name="date"/> <field name="description"/> <field name="course_id"/> </list> </field>
</record> <record id="grades_evaluations_form_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">grades.evaluation.form</field> <field name="model">grades.evaluation</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="Courses"> <sheet> <group> <field name="name"/> <field name="date"/> <field name="description"/> <field name="course_id"/> </group> <group> <field name="grade_ids" mode="tree" view_id="ref('grades_manager.grades_grade_list_view')" editable="bottom"/> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record> </odoo>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <odoo> <record id="grades_grade_list_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">grades.grade.list</field> <field name="model">grades.grade</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string="Grades"> <field name="student_id"/> <field name="value"/> <field name="date"/> <field name="evaluation_id"/> </tree> </field> </record> </odoo>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <odoo> <menuitem id="grades_manager_menu" name="Grades Manager"/> <menuitem id="grades_course_manager_menu" sequence="1" parent="grades_manager_menu" name="Course"/> <menuitem id="teacher_menu" parent="grades_manager_menu" name="Teacher" action="teacher_action"/> <menuitem id="students_menu" parent="grades_manager_menu" name="Students" action="students_action"/> <menuitem id="grades_course_menu" parent="grades_course_manager_menu" name="Courses" action="grades_courses_action"/> <menuitem id="grades_evaluation_menu" parent="grades_course_manager_menu" name="Evaluations" action="grades_evaluations_action"/> </odoo>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <odoo> <menuitem id="grades_manager_menu" name="Grades Manager"/> <menuitem id="grades_course_manager_menu" sequence="1" parent="grades_manager_menu" name="Course"/> <menuitem id="teacher_menu" parent="grades_manager_menu" name="Teacher" action="teacher_action"/> <menuitem id="students_menu" parent="grades_manager_menu" name="Students" action="grades_manager.students_action"/> <menuitem id="grades_course_menu" parent="grades_course_manager_menu" name="Courses" action="grades_courses_action"/> <menuitem id="grades_evaluation_menu" parent="grades_course_manager_menu" name="Evaluations" action="grades_evaluations_action"/> </odoo>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<odoo> <record id="view_partner_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">res.partner.form.ext</field> <field name="model">res.partner</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="base.view_partner_form" /> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="category_id" position="after"> <field name="is_teacher"/> </field> <xpath expr="//field[@name='vat']/.." position="inside"> <field name="is_freelance"/> </xpath> </field> </record>
<record id="teacher_list_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">teacher.list</field> <field name="model">res.partner</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <list string="Teachers"> <field name="display_name"/> <field name="phone"/> <field name="email"/> </list> </field> </record>
<record id="teacher_form_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">teacher.form</field> <field name="model">res.partner</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="Teacher"> <sheet> <group> <field name="display_name"/> <field name="phone"/> <field name="email"/> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record>
<record id="teacher_action" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">Teacher</field> <field name="res_model">res.partner</field> <field name="view_mode">list,form</field> <field name="domain">[('is_teacher', '=', True)]</field> <field name="view_ids" eval="[(5,0,0), (0, 0, {'view_mode': 'list', 'view_id': ref('teacher_list_view')}), (0, 0, {'view_mode': 'form', 'view_id': ref('teacher_form_view')}) ]"/> </record>
<!-- Vistas de estudiantes --> <record id="students_list_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">students.list</field> <field name="model">res.partner</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <list string="Teachers"> <field name="display_name"/> <field name="phone"/> <field name="email"/> </list> </field> </record>
<record id="teacher_form_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">teacher.form</field> <field name="model">res.partner</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="Teacher"> <sheet> <group> <field name="display_name"/> <field name="phone"/> <field name="email"/> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record>
</odoo>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<odoo> <record id="view_partner_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">res.partner.form.ext</field> <field name="model">res.partner</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="base.view_partner_form" /> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <field name="category_id" position="after"> <field name="is_teacher"/> </field> <xpath expr="//field[@name='vat']/.." position="inside"> <field name="is_freelance"/> </xpath> </field> </record>
<record id="teacher_list_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">teacher.list</field> <field name="model">res.partner</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <list string="Teachers"> <field name="display_name"/> <field name="phone"/> <field name="email"/> </list> </field> </record>
<record id="teacher_form_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">teacher.form</field> <field name="model">res.partner</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="Teacher"> <sheet> <group> <field name="display_name"/> <field name="phone"/> <field name="email"/> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record>
<record id="teacher_action" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">Teacher</field> <field name="res_model">res.partner</field> <field name="view_mode">list,form</field> <field name="domain">[('is_teacher', '=', True)]</field> <field name="view_ids" eval="[(5,0,0), (0, 0, {'view_mode': 'list', 'view_id': ref('teacher_list_view')}), (0, 0, {'view_mode': 'form', 'view_id': ref('teacher_form_view')}) ]"/> </record>
<!-- Vistas de estudiantes --> <record id="student_list_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">student.list</field> <field name="model">res.partner</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <list string="Students"> <field name="display_name"/> <field name="phone"/> <field name="email"/> </list> </field> </record>
<record id="student_form_view" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">student.form</field> <field name="model">res.partner</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string="Student"> <sheet> <group> <field name="display_name"/> <field name="phone"/> <field name="email"/> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record>
<record id="student_action" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">Students</field> <field name="res_model">res.partner</field> <field name="view_mode">list,form</field> <field name="domain">[("is_student", "=", True)]</field> <field name="view_ids" eval="[(5,0,0), (0, 0, {'view_mode': 'list', 'view_id': ref('student_list_view')}), (0, 0, {'view_mode': 'form', 'view_id': ref('student_form_view')}) ]"/> </record>
</odoo>
